biotools.summary: A web pipeline dedicated to protein structure modeling and small-ligand docking based on comparative analyses. Fold-recognition, template selection, structural alignment editing, structure comparisons, 3D-model building and evaluation are possible with @TOME-2 for inputted protein sequences.

bioschemas.name: aTOME-2
